## TGlFeatureFlags type

Features to enable, e.g. SCISSOR\_TEST.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlFeatureFlags = "BLEND" | "CULL_FACE" | "DEPTH_TEST" | "DITHER" | "POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL" | "SAMPLE_ALPHA_TO_COVERAGE" | "SAMPLE_COVERAGE" | "SCISSOR_TEST" | "STENCIL_TEST";
```
